description: This file contains core physics utilities for a game, including AABB collision detection, platform contact checks, and debug helpers.

methods.name: rectsOverlap(ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh)
methods.description: Performs an Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) overlap test between two rectangles.

methods.name: isPlayerOnAnyPlatform(x, y, w, h, platforms, flush = true)
methods.description: Checks if a player/entity's bounding box is flush or barely touching any platform from a list of platforms.

methods.name: isCollidingWithAnyPlatform(x, y, w, h, platforms)
methods.description: Performs a general collision test for a bounding box against a list of platforms, returning true if any overlap occurs.

ctags.name: GROUND_Y
ctags.pattern: /^export const GROUND_Y = 180 - 40; \/\/ Convention fallback; not used for main collision.$/

ctags.name: isCollidingWithAnyPlatform
ctags.pattern: /^export function isCollidingWithAnyPlatform(x, y, w, h, platforms) {$/

ctags.name: isPlayerOnAnyPlatform
ctags.pattern: /^export function isPlayerOnAnyPlatform(x, y, w, h, platforms, flush = true) {$/
ctags.signature: (x, y, w, h, platforms, flush = true)

ctags.name: rectsOverlap
ctags.pattern: /^export function rectsOverlap(ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh) {$/
ctags.signature: (ax, ay, aw, ah, bx, by, bw, bh)
